description: Karen is usually a very shy and timid girl who is even prone to passing out (called "The `nyu`s," for the syllable she utters before eventually passing out) when a situation gets too intense for her to handle. She frequently calls people by a title, such as calling Maiku, "Mr. Maiku", or "Maiku-San" in the Japanese version. Like Miina, she also develops feelings for Maiku, though she doesn`t act on them for the same reasons.
name: Onodera Karen
